import React from 'react' import { ArrowUpRight } from "lucide-react"; const Hero = () => { const floatingCards = [ { id: 1, imgSrc: "pet.png", title: "Pet Health Services", description: "Ensure your pet’s well-being with expert care.", }, { id: 2, imgSrc: "cat.png", title: "Book Grooming Section", description: "Professional grooming for a happy and healthy pet.", }, { id: 3, imgSrc: "dog.png", title: "Adopt a Lovely Pet", description: "Find a furry friend and give them a loving home.", }, ]; return (
{/* Changed p-6 to px-20 py-6 */}
{/* Left Section */}
{/* White Card with Title */}

Best Help
For Your
Lovely Pets

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Id sem amet mattis feugiat dolor turpis ut eu viverra. Id scelerisque et odio ultrices felis urna.

{/* Action Cards */}
{/* Store Card */}

Go To Our Store

{/* Booking Card */}

Book Grooming Section

From Our Specialist

{/* Center Section - Orange Card with Dog */}
{/* Right Section - Floating Cards */}
{floatingCards.map((card) => (

{card.title}

{card.description}

))}
) } export default Hero
